title: Update dropdown styling with white text and Royal Teal background

requirements.summary: Update all dropdown/select components to display option text in white color when opened
acceptanceCriteria: All dropdown option text displays in white color (#FFFFFF or equivalent)
Text color applies to options in open dropdown state
White text remains readable against Royal Teal background

file_operations.description: Add CSS rules targeting select option elements to set color: white for dropdown options. Use selectors that apply to native select elements and custom dropdown implementations across the application including form selects in Careers, Vendors, Ambulance Services, NGO Listing, and Admin Dashboard pages.

requirements.summary: Update all dropdown/select components to display Royal Teal background when opened
acceptanceCriteria: Dropdown menu background displays in Royal Teal color when opened
Background color applies to entire dropdown panel including all options
Royal Teal background matches the existing platform color scheme

file_operations.description: Add CSS rules targeting select dropdown panels and option elements to set background-color using the Royal Teal color value. Apply to both the dropdown container and individual options to ensure complete Royal Teal coverage when the dropdown is open.

requirements.summary: Define comprehensive dropdown styling rules in global CSS with white text and Royal Teal background
acceptanceCriteria: CSS rules target dropdown option elements across all form components
Styling applies consistently to dropdowns in Careers, Vendors, Ambulance Services, NGO Listing, and Admin Dashboard pages
Hover and focus states maintain white text visibility

file_operations.description: Add comprehensive CSS rules for select elements including hover and focus states. Target select, select option, and any custom dropdown class patterns used in the application. Ensure white text color (#FFFFFF) and Royal Teal background are applied consistently across all dropdown states including :hover and :focus pseudo-classes for accessibility and visibility.

requirements.summary: Ensure Royal Teal color token is defined in Tailwind configuration for dropdown styling
acceptanceCriteria: Royal Teal color token is defined in Tailwind theme
Color value matches existing Royal Teal usage in the platform
Dropdown components can reference the color token consistently

file_operations.description: Verify that Royal Teal color is defined in the Tailwind theme.extend.colors configuration. If not already present, add a 'royal-teal' color token with the appropriate color value that matches existing platform usage. This ensures the color can be referenced consistently in CSS and Tailwind utility classes for dropdown styling.
